description: Try our easy to follow Indulgent Choc Banoffee Pie recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Indulgent Choc Banoffee Pie Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Process biscuits in a food processor until fine crumbs form. Transfer to a bowl and stir in the butter. Press biscuit mixture over base and sides of a deep 25.5 cm fluted tin with removable base. Freeze while you prepare filling.

To make caramel filling, combine condensed milk, butter, sugar, cream and syrup in a medium heavy-based saucepan. Stir over medium heat for about 20 minutes or until mixture is a rich caramel colour. Cool for 10 minutes.
Pour caramel filling into biscuit base. Freeze for 4 hours or chill overnight until firm (see tip).
To serve, peel bananas and halve lengthways. Arrange on top of caramel, cut-side up. Spoon whipped cream over and dust with cocoa.
